                "Efficient portfolios offer investors the highest possible expected return for a given level of risk.", 
                "To find the risk of a portfolio, we need to know the degree to which stock returns move together. Covariance and correlation measure the co-movement of returns.", 
                "The goal of an investor who is seeking to earn the highest possible expected return for any level  of volatility is to find the portfolio that generates the steepest possible line when combined with the risk-free investment.")
cat(q1,longmcq(q1_choices))
